Summary: I saw a formation of red lighted craft flying in a "W" shaped formation, coming from the North and Headed Southeast.
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a formation of red lighted craft flying in a "W" shaped formation, coming from the North and Headed Southeast. It looked like two red lights, like the way you see planes lit up. They were moving slow. I noticed the objects after I heard some fireworks go off. I looked up expecting to roman candles.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around August 4th 2012
